p: A drop of 5 µL of the samples from the plate suspended in 15 µL of distilled water was applied on to the grids strengthened with a carbon coating. The excess was then drawn off with filter paper and the grid was air dried. A drop of 50% uranyl acetate and 50% absolute ethanol was applied to the grids for 30 s. The excess was again drawn off with filter paper and the grid finally was air dried.
